comments:
build I20050413

- exported the browser example from its product editor
- got the following in the log
- the project in question is just called "mview" in my workspace (workspace dir
is d:\eclipse-new\plugins), and it has a plugin.xml file, but no
build.properties file

Created an attachment (id=20155)
Zip of the mview project
Note that it's looking for mview_1.0.0 instead of just mview.
Jeff thinks this may be due to the lack of a build.properties file.
investigate for rc1
I verified and this no longer happens:
- in the IDE, pde build now reuses PDE UI state and therefore it never runs this
code
- in releng style mode the path are derived from the disk location

traces.message: Could not find a plugin.xml or a fragment.xml in d:\eclipse-new\plugins\mview\plugins\mview_1.0.0.
